title: No newline at the end of file in project file
body:
_This issue has been moved from [a ticket on Developer Community](https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/t/No-newline-at-the-end-of-file-in-project/1669342)._

---
[severity:It bothers me. A fix would be nice]
The visual studio project file(*.csproj, *.cxproj ...) generated by visual studio ide doesn't include newline at the end of file.

---

nodes.body: The hypothesis is that the Object Model API for creating projects isn't writing the XML with a trailing newline. We'd definitely accept a fix here!
. . . as long as it doesn't require extreme `System.Xml` gymnastics.
